links.title: Broadcom: Will Intel make a bid?
links.description: Broadcom (AVGO) reports earnings Thursday March 15th after the close. Broadcom has beaten earnings estimates for 27 straight quarters. It beats EPS estimates by 3.4% on average. The stock goes up 2.3% on average after reporting earnings. Broadcom has been trying to buy Qualcomm (QCOM) Their bid to buy Qualcomm has put pressure on Broadcom's stock price.

links.title: Cleveland Clinic MD on Twitter
links.description: A study shows that the first FDA-approved smartwatch health accessory can effectively identify afib. #ACC18 https://t.co/V0sK0uBaF0

messages.body:
$AAPL WATCH and the HEART 
 
https://consultqd.clevelandclinic.org/smartwatch-technology-reliably-detects-afib-prior-to-cardioversion/

links.title: Smartwatch Technology Reliably Detects Afib Prior to Cardioversion
links.description: A newly FDA-approved smartwatch accessory can record heart rhythm and successfully differentiate atrial fibrillation (AF) from normal sinus rhythm (SR) through an automated algorithm, according to a Cleveland Clinic investigation. The study, which will be presented March 11 at the American College of Cardiology's 67th Scientific Session, also showed that the accuracy of interpretation gets even better when the accessory is supported by physician review.
